text: Kogda vy prizyvayete tekh, kotorym poklonyayetes' pomimo Allakha, oni vas ne slyshat, a yesli by oni slyshali, oni by ne otvetili. V Sudnyy den' oni otkazhutsya ot vashego mnogobozhiya i pokloneniya im naryadu s Allakhom. Nikto ne dast tebe vesti o budushchey zhizni tak, kak Znayushchiy, Osvedomlonnyy
